review: I had been to the hospital and met the doctor for my baby. Consultation experience was very great and it was a nice experience. I have already recommended doctor to my family or friends. No medical tests was done. Vaccination was done to my baby and follow up was done. Doctor was not in a hurry while treating baby and gave enough time to us in and out to understand things like why he gives medicines explained well and guided us well. I got to know about this doctor via practo. He was friendly with us. Hospitality was good during covid situations like social distance, hygienic and sanitization.
